channel.title: Some type of pause void

item.title: Some type of pause void
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

I need help writing a pause void, that pauses for X seconds then continues actions on the next line.

EX:

[code] else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cont”))
{
sendMessage(“Off you go :)”);
stillgfx(83, absY +1, absX);
stillgfx(481, absY, absX);
pause;
teleportToX = 3480;
teleportToY = 9836;
pEmote = 2242;

    }[/code]

and the void would be like:

public void pause(int seconds) { blah blah wtf do I do. blah. [br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2007, 01:10:59 AM[/size][hr]Sorry… this is kinda a bump, but this post has had almost 24 hours. Any help please.

Read full topic
